RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute

RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The integer ConsoleObject's attribute.

An integer can take a integer numeric value.

Member Function Documentation

int RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::count (  )  [virtual, inherited]

Count the available commands for this attribute.

Returns:
1 if the attribute is in read-only mode, otherwise returns 2.

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::getAccessText (  )  [inherited]

Get the access mode in text format.

Returns:
[ro] if the attribute is in read-only mode, otherwise return [rw] (read and write mode).

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::getDesc (  )  [inherited]

Get the description of the attribute.

If the desc string is empty, a warning message will be send to the Logger.

Returns:
A char* to the description of the attribute

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::getName (  )  [inherited]

Get the name of the attribute.

Returns:
The value of the name property

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute::getTypeText (  )  [virtual]

Return a char * defining the type of the attribute.

This function is used by the console to show the type of the attribute. It must be [int] [char] [bool]...

Implements RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute.

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute::getValueText (  )  [virtual]

Return a char * of the value.

This function is used by the console to get the value. According to the type of the child the implementation will be different.

Implements RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute.

Reimplemented in RainbruRPG::Exception::FpsAttribute, and RainbruRPG::Exception::GuiTransAttribute.

void RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::setDesc ( const char *  desc  )  [inherited]

Change the DescriptionÂ of the attribute.

Send a warning message to the Logger if the parameter is an empty string.

Parameters:
desc The new description string

void RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::setName ( const char *  name  )  [inherited]

Change the name of this attribute.

The char* is set to the name attribute. If it is NULL (an empty string) an Error message is send to the Logger.

Parameters:
name The new name of the attribute

virtual void RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute::setValue ( int   )  [protected, pure virtual]

Set the value according to the type.

This method must be override. It is called when the value change, called by setValueText(char *);

Implemented in RainbruRPG::Exception::FpsAttribute, and RainbruRPG::Exception::GuiTransAttribute.

bool RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute::setValueText ( const char *   )  [virtual]

Set the value of the attribute.

This function is used by the console to set the value. According to the type of the child the implementation will be different. The function must return if the set is correct.

Returns:
true if the affectation is correct otherwise false.

Implements RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute.
